name: Addermarch Campaign - Session 7
tagline: in which the party discovers a cave dweller
shortSummary: Leaving Fontwick, the party survives spider ambushes in the western Stonewolds, meets Norman the Wanderer, and infiltrates an ogre-guarded cave to descend into the West Stonewolds Caves.
longSummary: Departing Samatha of Fontwick's farm, Drou, Fazoth, and Yvan head into the rocky, web-strewn forests of the western Stonewolds. A nearly invisible web trap and a swarm of tiny spiders briefly threaten them before Yvan's flames and Fazoth's magic burn the swarm away and they flee a looming giant spider. That night they camp a few miles from the cave they seek and meet Norman the Wanderer, an eccentric hermit who complains about them being in his hills but warms to conversation, warning them about a 'double-big man' and wolf at the cave entrance and agreeing to guide them at dawn. In the morning Norman leads them to the cave where a ten-foot 'big man' butchers a cow for stew; Drou lures him away with illusory goats, Fazoth puts the wolf to sleep, and the party rappels down a deep pit into the West Stonewolds Caves, severing their upper rope to thwart the furious ogre before descending further into the lightless depths.
